Interface ListenableScheduledFuture<V extends @Nullable Object>

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Delayed>, Delayed, Future<V>, ListenableFuture<V>, ScheduledFuture<V>
@GwtCompatible public interface ListenableScheduledFuture<V extends @Nullable Object> extends ScheduledFuture<V>, ListenableFuture<V>
Helper interface to implement both ListenableFuture and ScheduledFuture.
Since:
15.0
Author:
Anthony Zana
